DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Secukinumab Compared Etanercept Subjects With Moderate Severe , Chronic Plaque-Type Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Subjects chronic , plaquetype psoriasis least 6 month Must moderate severe psoriasis base PASI great 12 , IGA great 3 , great 10 % body surface area Must inadequately control prior treatment ( topicals , phototherapy , and/or systemic therapy ) Forms psoriasis chronic , plaquetype ( pustular , erythrodermic guttate psoriasis ) Drug induce psoriasis Use psoriasis treatment study Prior use etanercept Prior use secukinumab drug target IL17 ( interleukin 17 ) IL17 receptor Pregnant lactate woman ; woman agree use contraception study 16 week stop treatment Significant medical problem uncontrolled high blood pressure , congestive heart failure , etc . History ongoing , chronic recurrent infection evidence tuberculosis Allergy rubber latex Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
